;Mati Kochavi is the founder and CEO of AGT International. AGT, one of the fastest growing security solutions organizations in the world, has operations on 5 continents. AGT's solutions are driven by Mr. Kochavi's visionary leadership, which sees security as an integral component of the infrastructure of globalization. Mr. Kochavi is also Chairman of 3i-MIND a pioneer in a new category of technology that leverages data, operational know-how, and human intuition to dramatically advance the value of intelligence and insights.
